text: @senatemajldr When all the COVID19 is over the truth will come out on U, Trump & REPS.  WHY R  U playing politics  now, ppl R dying!  R ventilators being held back from DEM Governors? Hope not? Hope U saw the power of leadership GOVERNOR BESHEAR!  Love & respected around the world♡
